rooms.description: Open plan living area with exposed concrete elements reflecting Brutalist style; large windows to incorporate natural light while ensuring privacy.
Spacious central room designed for family gatherings and social interaction, featuring a spacious balcony overlooking the garden.
Integrated dining area within the living space; direct connection to the kitchen ensuring functional flow.

openings.description: Large steel door with reinforced design reflecting Brutalist principles.
Opening for the two-car garage integrated into the ground floor.

rooms.description: Spacious bedroom with an adjoining balcony overlooking the garden; designed to face the direction considered auspicious per Vastu guidelines.
Additional bedroom with a balcony providing natural light and privacy; aligned according to local building norms.

openings.description: Winding staircase connecting ground and upper floors; designed for efficient movement while integrating the Brutalist aesthetic.

rooms.description: Third bedroom with a balcony facing the garden; designed for privacy and adherence to Vastu principles.

openings.description: Private balcony area providing outdoor space and garden view.

garage.description: Integrated into the ground floor with direct access to the street and parking for two cars.

garden.description: Large garden area designed according to Vastu guidelines, enhancing natural light and ventilation throughout the villa.
